website_summaries.verdict: A soft version of the typical hard kettlebell, the sand-filled neoprene weights allow you to tailor each workout.
pros: Handle is made of sturdy fiberglass
Soft weights won't damage the floor if dropped
Use up to three sand-filled bags at once
Sandbags are versatile enough to be used alone or with separately sold cardio barbells
cons: Occasional complaints that the handle is too big to use in certain exercise moves

customer_reviews.title: Needs spacers.
customer_reviews.text: Wish this item had spacers to add when you remove weights to keep the load from shifting so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant innovation
customer_reviews.text: Best kettle bell ever especially for a home gym. With its doughnut shaped sandbags, there is little danger of breaking something or damaging furniture. Additionally, the weights can be added or removed in increments of 7.5 lbs units to bring the total to 23.5 lbs. A wonderful piece of engineering and a very clever design.
customer_reviews.author: Global Kate

customer_reviews.title: A hard miss for me. Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This was a good idea but a terrible design. The handle is so much bigger than a normal kettle bell and it’s bulky. The sandbags shift while swinging. It doesn’t feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Weights slide around.
customer_reviews.text: Concerned about the weights staying on when I swing. When I don’t have the full weight on there, the weights slide around and the tightening mechanism isn’t sturdy enough for me to have faith in it long term. It’s a great concept and I use it frequently, but I am concerned about it failing at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what’s needed. I understand that it will not function like a true kettlebell. the extra softbells work as lower weight dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: Tamikka

customer_reviews.title: Soft and heavy
customer_reviews.text: A soft but heavy enough kettlebell. Adjusts easily. Your need a model with more weight too :)
customer_reviews.author: D_ElH

customer_reviews.title: Weight shifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for safety reasons since we have two toddlers who are very curious about the things we use. I thought this would be great for safety reasons, however the piece that screws on to tighten the weights does not tighten all the way which cause the weight to shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have only had a couple days but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hg

customer_reviews.title: Great Kell
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. The soft plates and plastic handle are great. Less chance of injuring myself and I love that I can adjust the weight. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It's better than a regular kettlebell. My wife and I are turns and she decreases by 10 pounds with ease. We have enjoyed this very much. We also don't have to worry about ruining our tiles floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Villaverde

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile product
customer_reviews.text: Space saving, since it's 3 kettlebells in one. Very convenient to use and change the weights out. I love that it's soft and won't dent my floors if I set it down to hard. The handle is comfortable and plenty of room for both hands to be on it at once.
customer_reviews.author: esby elle

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke after less than a month of use. Bad choice of material for application.
customer_reviews.author: David Raring

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have to worry about dropping the weight and disturbing my neighbors or breaking a toe.
customer_reviews.author: Deb.T333

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stackable
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that is adjustable. Very soft, no risk of stubbing a toe, unless you are kicking it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous
customer_reviews.text: Love the adjustability and the fact that it’s soft when putting it down.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tavenner

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design a lot. Besides it’s a kettlebell, I can use the soft disc as sandbag for yoga also. Andy my five years old son likes to play with it also. I don’t need to worry he or my floor will be hurted as it’s soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: It's fine.
customer_reviews.text: If you are using for purely a swing, you're good. If you remove a weight, it loses its stability and no matter what move you try, the weights are always out of alignment. They should make a weightless spacer so the weights don't move. They are nice and soft which is good on the skin and body. Handle isi a little too wide as well. Overall, its a functioning 30lb kettlebell and I still use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael crouch

product_meta.title: Hyperwear Soft Adjustable Kettlebell Handle & SoftBell Weight Plates Available in 7, 10, 15, 18, 20, 23, 25 or 30 lb Weights Compatible SoftBell Dumbbell, Barbell Sets for Strength & Core Training
product_meta.description: The SoftBell multi weight soft kettlebell is part of the interchangeable Hyperwear SoftBell free weight system of dumbbells, kettlebells, and cardio barbells. The world's most adjustable and portable kettlebell weights, no other kettlebell combines the safety and versatility of soft weight plates with a solid fiberglass ergonomic handle giving you the performance of an elite competition kettlebell in a great beginner package. Swing it, clean it, squat it and lift without fear of injury or damage to your floors. Best kettlebell for a commercial fitness studio, home gym, or addition to your set of crossfit home equipment. Great value and space saving over solid cast iron individual weights. Each size will ship with anywhere from 1-3 weight plates depending on the total kettle bell size- all listed sizes sold separately. Start with a 10 lb kettlebell, for example, and add to your set to make a 15 pound kettlebell. Weight plates arrive ALREADY FILLED. Patented US 10105566, US 8622877 B2. SoftBell is a registered trademark.
feature_bullets: SOFT sand-filled neoprene weights, all sizes sold separately, plus heavy-duty fiber glass handle kettlebell part of expandable SoftBell system of adjustable free weights that prevent accidental damage to floors or injuries ideal for home gyms and fitness studios

ENDLESS variety of kettlebell fitness exercises are possible with this adjustable workout kettlebell for flexibility, balance and whole body toning of abs, arms, thighs, hips, back and shoulders while giving you a good cardio workout

PERFORMS like a solid metal or vinyl kettlebell with the same grips by using fiber glass reinforced solid plastic handle and neoprene kettlebell plates filled with sand making it superior for learning technique of movements like the Turkish get up
PATENTED soft weights protect users, floors, and are quiet when dropped but allow weight adjustment and give you the same great workout as more expensive sets of metal kettlebell weights
BACKED by Hyperwear USA inventors of innovative fitness accessories like the SandBell sandbag with one year limited warranty and free exercise and workout videos available
